ARABIC: قَالَ هَٰذَا فِرَاقُ بَيْنِى وَبَيْنِكَ سَأُنَبِّئُكَ بِتَأْوِيلِ مَا لَمْ تَسْتَطِع عَّلَيْهِ صَبْرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'This is where you and I part company. I will let you know the explanation of those things about which you were not able to restrain yourself.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: This is the parting of our "ways," he said. "But I will now explain the things you could not bear:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He said: "This brings me and you to a parting of ways. Now I shall explain to you the true meaning of things about which you could not remain patient.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He replied, "This is where we should depart from one another. I shall give an explanation to you for all that I have done for which you could not remain patient.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “This is the parting between you and me; I shall now tell you the interpretation of the matters you could not patiently bear.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "This is the parting between you and I, I will tell you the interpretation of (those) things over which you were not able to be patient."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: This shall be separation between me and you; now I will inform you of the significance of that with which you could not have patience.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Said he, 'This is the parting between me and thee. Now I will tell thee the interpretation of that thou couldst not bear patiently.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: This is the parting between thee and me! I will announce unto thee the interpretation of that thou couldst not bear with patience.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He answered, "This is where you and I must part company. But first I will tell you the meaning of the things you could not bear with patiently.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: this shall be the parting between me and thee; now I shall declare unto thee the interpretation of that wherewith thou wast not able to have patience.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘This is where you and I shall part. I will inform you about the interpretation of that over which you could not maintain patience.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He answered: "This is the parting between me and thee: now will I tell thee the interpretation of (those things) over which thou wast unable to hold patience.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (Khidr) said: "This is the parting between me and you, I will tell you the interpretation of (those) things over which you were unable to hold patience.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He said: 'This is the parting between me and you. But now I will tell you the interpretation of that which you could not patiently bear.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “This is the parting between you and me. I will tell you the interpretation of what you were unable to endure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Al-Khidh r] said, "This is parting between me and you. I will inform you of the interpretation of that about which you could not have patience.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [18:78] Said he, al-Khidr, to him, ‘This is the parting, that is, the moment for parting, between me and you (baynī wa-baynika, here [the preposition] bayna has been annexed to a non-multiple [noun], but this is allowed [grammatically] because it is then repeated with [its other noun together with] the coordinating wāw). I will inform you, before I part company with you, the interpretation of that over which you were not able to maintain patience.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 321 (He said) Khidr said: (This is the parting between thee and me) Moses! (I will announce unto thee the interpretation of that thou couldst not bear with patience).
